title: Reminiscences of childhood at Inverkeithing;
author: Simson, James
snippet: — Occasionally a large steamer would arrive at St, Davids for coals, and blow off her steam, which always interested us.

title: May Margaret,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: But mostly these things go by contraries — the fair young Davids mating with the maids, dark but comely, out of the patched tents of Kedar and the tans of dusky Se- pharvaim.
